required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Record-review Study in Patients Who Had Diabetic Foot Ulcer
clinical_study.official_title: A Retrospective Record-review Study in Patients Who Had Participated in the ON101CLCT02 Diabetic Foot Ulcer Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the medical cost of illness for DFUs on the patients who had used ON101 or Aquacel® in the ON101CLCT02 trial.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to two years after the patient had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial

primary_outcome.measure: Wound characteristics of DFUs (classification and proportion)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to two years after the patient had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of DFU recurrence after completing or withdrawing from the ON101CLCT02 trial
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to two years after the patient had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial
Up to two years after the patient had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of wound infection, gangrene, and amputation
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to two years after the patient had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of wound infection, gangrene, and amputation
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to two years after the patient had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial

arm_group.description: Patients Who Had Participated in the ON101CLCT02 Diabetic Foot Ulcer Trial and assigned to ON101 Cream arm
Patients Who Had Participated in the ON101CLCT02 Diabetic Foot Ulcer Trial and assigned to Aquacel® Hydrofiber® dressing arm

intervention.description: Not applicable in this retrospective study

study_pop.textblock: The ON101CLCT02 trial enrolled 236 subjects and was conducted in Taiwan, China, and USA. The target population of this study consists of the Taiwanese DFU patients who had completed or early withdrawn from the ON101CLCT02 trial.

criteria.textblock: No additional inclusion or exclusion criteria will be applied.
